sentences.en: It would be uneconomic to try and repair it.
Many shipping businesses expression ~ the age since of uneconomic freight rate.
sentences.cn: 二零零九年许多船运自己搞因运费率不合算而面临倒闭.

sentences.en: Many shipping businesses face ~ this year because of uneconomic freight rate.
sentences.cn: 今年许多船运公司因运费率不合算而面临倒闭.

sentences.en: Recognizing and avoiding uneconomic growth are not easy.
sentences.cn: 划不来的成长不容易辨识,而且不易避免.

sentences.en: Sending a replacement jet would have been uneconomic.
sentences.cn: 当时派一架喷气式飞机去替换的话，代价太大了。
效益不好的企业的关闭

sentences.en: The company said the service was uneconomic.
sentences.cn: 公司说这项业务不赚钱。

sentences.en: The purchase of specialist equipment may be uneconomic or insufficiently flexible.
sentences.cn: 购买专家设备可能是浪费或者不够灵活.

sentences.en: This method was uneconomic for it was impossible to recover the spent acid.
sentences.cn: 由于不能回收废酸,所以这个方法是不经济的.

sentences.en: You feel that it's uneconomic to insist that people work together in groups. Why is this?
sentences.cn: 你觉得要求大家分组工作不划算，这是为什么呢？

trans.tran_cn: （企业、工厂等）不赢利的，不赚钱的，不合算的，不经济的
